name: Cowboy Zelda
description:
Animations is huge thanks to HisNameIs(Jonah)

Music is huge thanks to Yuu Otosaka (Taehyuan)

WASD to move and Left click to shoot,

The cowboy will shoot in direction the player is headed in

https://emergencyplayer.itch.io/cowboy-zelda-browser-v1 click here for the webGL version, also for mac users
